definitions.definition: Descent in a line from a common progenitor ; progeny ; descending line of offspring or ascending line of parentage .
A number of lines of text in a column .
A fee or rate paid per line of text.

main_definition: Descent in a line from a common progenitor ; progeny ; descending line of offspring or ascending line of parentage .
secondary_definitions: ( press ) A number of lines of text in a column .
A fee or rate paid per line of text.
